title: Blank uni30A6 in FontCreator
content:
These were "Japanese letters", try to add these.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417162606im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata1_4982.png)
  
The properties dialog.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417162606im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata2_5486.png)
  
The katakana letter u, imported.
